articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Naomi Hauret
Personal advice for woment trying to get into web3 :
- Don't buy courses
- Don't buy ANYTHING from anyone that uses "it's for women" as a marketing argument (NFT, token etc)
- Watch videos from the EthGlobal & Developer DAO youtube channels
- Join hackathons
- hot take: be anon

Sign ups are now open here: https://lu.ma/lens-cdmx-2022

Set your reminders below👇

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
WeaveDB - Decentralized NoSQL DB on @ArweaveTeam  ⚡️
WeaveDB is a decentralized Firestore, which brings smooth UX, complexity, and scalability to web3 dapps. Developers can build complex logic for full-stack dapps without writing a smart contract. https://weavedb.mirror.xyz/E4VmonwIP2hV3W3wIum3oFz4giAPzM2E_DeSRLQelL0

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT the luke 🏳️‍🌈
There's no limit to the size you can upload to @ArweaveTeam with  @BundlrNetwork. We offer optional event callbacks you can use to get updated each time a new file "chunk" is uploaded, here I use the callback data to build a progress bar. Seconds later 90MB are on the permaweb.
